abstract: I belive this portrayal of the Case System of Legal Study will be invaluable to every student entering law school, and most of those who have completed their 1L year.  Frankly, most practicing lawyers would probably benefit by a reading.  I've been told it's a "good read."  Hope you'll agree.
title: The WHY of It: Langdell's Generation Speaks to Today's Law Sudents
subject: law
